# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="e30ed-102">HOW TO：移除 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e30ed-103">當您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項設定為自動產生，根據其資料來源及其資料行時，您可以選擇性地省略某些資料行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-104">您可以藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-105">或者，您可以從檢視的資料行設定隱藏<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>屬性設`false`。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-106">當您想要顯示隱藏的資料行，在某些情況下，或您需要存取而不會顯示它的資料行中的，這個技術非常有用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="e30ed-107">若要移除自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-108">呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="e30ed-109">若要隱藏自動產生的資料行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-110">設定的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>屬性設`false`。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e30ed-112">編譯程式碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-113">這個範例需要：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-114">A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，名為`dataGridView1`繫結至資料表，其中包含`Fax`並`CustomerID`資料行，例如`Customers`Northwind 範例資料庫中的資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e30ed-115"><xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> 組件的參考。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e30ed-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
